scripts.export:mov: ffmpeg -framerate 20 -i frames/frame_%04d.png -c:v prores_ks -pix_fmt yuva444p10le -profile:v 4 output.mov -y && rm -rf frames/*
scripts.export:mov1: ffmpeg -framerate 20 -i frames1/frame_%04d.png -i audio/audio1.mp3 -c:v prores_ks -pix_fmt yuva444p10le -profile:v 4 -c:a aac -shortest output1.mov -y
scripts.export:mov2: ffmpeg -framerate 20 -i frames2/frame_%04d.png -i audio/audio2.mp3 -c:v prores_ks -pix_fmt yuva444p10le -profile:v 4 -c:a aac -shortest output2.mov -y
scripts.export:mov3: ffmpeg -framerate 20 -i frames3/frame_%04d.png -i audio/audio3.mp3 -c:v prores_ks -pix_fmt yuva444p10le -profile:v 4 -c:a aac -shortest output3.mov -y
scripts.export:mov4: ffmpeg -framerate 20 -i frames4/frame_%04d.png -i audio/audio4.mp3 -c:v prores_ks -pix_fmt yuva444p10le -profile:v 4 -c:a aac -shortest output4.mov -y
scripts.export:mov5: ffmpeg -framerate 20 -i frames5/frame_%04d.png -i audio/audio5.mp3 -c:v prores_ks -pix_fmt yuva444p10le -profile:v 4 -c:a aac -shortest output5.mov -y
